description:
Chuta Kokonose is a slightly awkward middle school student, who often talks to himself. He has been hearing a voice that only he can hear ever since he could remember. One day, he is recruited into the Space Police ēlDLIVE. However, someone seems to be rather against his recruitment... his classmate, Misuzu Sonokata. While on a mission, Chuta finally finds out what the source of the voice is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chuta, the Voice, and the Qualifying Exam
Chûta, la voix, et l`examen d`entrée
